title: is there a way i can connect back to champ select after league crashes
body: so my league crashes often in champ select and when it does i close it and re open it but i cant connect back to champ select. I know that i still have time because my freinds are in the champ select but when i turn my league back on i cant recconect. Why riot just add this feuture i have lost over 100 lp of all the times i dodged becuase my client crashed.

replies.body:
There actually is a feature that allows you to reconnect to matches, but not if something in between your PC and our servers causes an unstable connection and prevents you from properly communicating with our servers. There are likely some issues in your local network settings causing issues with your PC reaching our servers reliably, so I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address any of those potentially conflicting settings.

Let me know if this helped.

If it only happens sometimes and we can surf the internet while champ select is frozen, it's not an issue from the player's end...

You guys need to overhaul the champ select system and mb the whole client as it relies too much on connection checks that always seems to fail.
